sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Retention of Illinois Students and Equity Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Retention of Illinois Students and Equity Act.

sections.heading: Findings.   The General Assembly makes all of the following findings:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly makes all of the following findings:

sections.heading: Definition. In this Act, "Illinois resident" includes any person who is deemed an Illinois resident for tuition purposes under State law.
sections.text: Definition. In this Act, "Illinois resident" includes any person who is deemed an Illinois resident for tuition purposes under State law.

sections.heading: Equitable eligibility for financial aid and benefits.
sections.text: Equitable eligibility for financial aid and benefits.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
